chantey.title: Shanadore
chantey.text:
Shanadore's a rolling river, _Hurrah!_ you rolling river, Oh, Shanadore's a rolling river, _Ah Hah!_ I'm bound away, O'er the wild Missouri.
Shanadore's a packet sailor, Chorus.
Shanadore's a bright mulatto, Chorus.
Shanadore, I long to hear you, Chorus

I'm bound a-way, O'er the wild_ Mis-sou-ri.
